definitions.Yan1: Yan, a vassal state of Zhou in modern Hebei and Liaoning; north Hebei; the four Yan kingdoms of the Sixteen Kingdoms, namely: Former Yan 前燕 (337-370), Later Yan 後燕|后燕 (384-409), Southern Yan 南燕 (398-410), Northern Yan 北燕 (409-436); surname Yan;
definitions.yan4: swallow (family Hirundinidae); old variant of 宴[yan4]; variant of 燕[yan4];
